name: A BLOOMSBY Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "BLOOMSBY", find a 5-letter word for a flower, or a word meaning 'to blossom'.
questions.explanation:
Bloom.

	A bloom is a flower that has just blossomed, or bloomed!  It can be found right inside BLOOMsby.

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word meaning a male child, using only letters in "BLOOMSBY".
questions.explanation:
Boy.

	A boy is a male child, not yet an adult man.  A female child is called a girl, who is not yet an adult woman.

questions.text: Using only letters in "BLOOMSBY", find a 5-letter word for the main room in a hotel, or the first room you enter.
questions.explanation:
Lobby.

	The lobby of a hotel is where you can check in and out of your room.  Sometimes the lobby has comfy chairs to sit and read in.

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word, using only letters in "BLOOMSBY", that is either a man's name or what you might do for apples.
questions.explanation:
Bob.

	Bob is a shortened form of the name Robert.  You can also call someone named Robert these names: Rob, Robby, or Bobby.  Bobbing for apples is a game where you try to get an apple out of a bucket of water using only your mouth.

questions.text: Find a 3-letter word that means to cry, using only letters in "BLOOMSBY".
questions.explanation:
Sob.

	To sob is to cry.  Usually, sobbing means crying so much that you gasp for air while crying.

questions.text: Using only letters in "BLOOMSBY", find a 3-letter word for the sound a cow makes.
questions.explanation:
Moo.

	A moo is a kind of low noise.  Most often, a moo refers to the sound a cow or a bull makes.

questions.text: Using only letters in "BLOOMSBY", find a 3-letter word that is the noise a ghost makes, or something someone says when they don't like something, like a movie.
questions.explanation:
Boo.

	To boo is to show that you didn't like the play, movie, speech, or whatever it was.  In cartoons and movies, ghosts say "Boo!" to scare people.  A boo is also a ghost's name in the "Mario" video game series.

questions.text: Using only letters in "BLOOMSBY", find a 3-letter word meaning crafty, like a fox or raccoon.
questions.explanation:
Sly.

	Is someone is crafty, they are known to be as "sly" as a fox.  Sly is also the name of a Beanie Baby fox, and it is also the name of a video game raccoon.

questions.text: Find a 4-letter word, using only letters in "BLOOMSBY", that means the sound of thunder, or any other loud, deep noise.
questions.explanation:
Boom.

	A boom is a loud, deep noise, such as the sound thunder makes.  It can be a very scary noise.  A boom can also be something that has a camera or a microphone attached to the end, so actors can be seen and heard from all different angles.

questions.text: Using only letters in "BLOOMSBY", find a 3-letter word for an angry group of people.
questions.explanation:
Mob.

	An angry mob is usually seen in cartoons and movies as having torches and pitchforks, though this is not always how a mob looks.  Mobs can be angry, or simply disorderly.  For instance, if a store is having an 80% off sale, you might see a mob of people waiting for the doors to open.
